annotation_workflow.returns: this function has no return value
annotation_workflow.title: Register the virtual cell network modelling workflows

parameters.name: src
parameters.text: the ncbi genbank assembly source file its file path

parameters.name: outputdir
parameters.text: the result outputdir and temp workspace location, default value is NULL means use the parent dir of the input src

parameters.name: biocyc
parameters.text: the directory path to the biocyc reference pathway

parameters.name: regprecise
parameters.text: the data repository xml file path to the regprecise motif database.

modelling_cellgraph.returns: this function has no return value, and then generated virtual cell model file will be saved at the ``outputdir`` with a fixed file name: ``model.vcell``. and the output dir also contains a html/pdf report about the virtual cell modelling result.
modelling_cellgraph.title: Run the cell graph structure modelling workflow

parameters.name: src
parameters.text: the GCModeller virtual cell model assembly file its file path

modelling_kinetics.title: Run the kinetics parameter fitting based on the omics expression data

assemble_metabolic_graph.title: the metabolic pathway network is modelling via the reference BioCyc database

assemble_transcript_graph.details: The network modelling workflow is based on the regprecise database
assemble_transcript_graph.title: Workflow model for create the transcription regulation network

tfbs_motif_scanning.title: Create the motif TFBS motif data from the gene upstream data

extract_gbff.title: Helper function for extract the annotation features from genbank file
